author: neilg
msg: disable compression of jar files in ant builds to bring them into sync with our make-based builds.

author: neilg
msg: fix a bug with attribute defaults reported by Etienne Roy

author: elena
msg: When validation is turned off, the parser did not normalize attribute values in DTDs.
Separated validation code from normalization code, fixed normalization algorithm.
Plus, SubstitutionGroupComparator is no longer instantiated for DTD traversal.

author: elena
msg: We should not raize an exception, cause we already do much better checking

author: sandygao
msg: accidentally modified an error message. now changing it back.
